resources.string: We\'re pleased to serve you today.\n Kindly login | register to enjoy using FWB Mshiko.
Kindly fill the below details accordingly.
In case of emergency whom should be contacted (next of kin)
Provide details of next of kin
FWB Mshiko has been designed & developed for the purpose of easing FWB operations to its valued members. Moreover facilitating loan request, payment information and processing.
Process your loans instantly with FWB Mshiko.
Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old.

It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance.
Read this update from FWB Mshiko App:
You can request extra details via the following options
Drop your request to FWB community
There is no internet connection. Check your internet settings.
Failed to send data, please try again.
Your data have been successfully saved.
Password should have 6 or more characters.
Thank you for registering your details in FWB Mshiko App. Congrats.
Kindly fill your phone number to check for your registration status. \nLogin credentials have been sent to your SMS inbox.
Failed verification; Kindly communicate with FWB administration
Username | Password is not correct. Try again.
Member verification is pending, kindly check your verification status
Failed member verification, kindly contact FWB Administration
Are you sure you want to logout from FWB Mshiko?
By clicking "Logout" you\'ll be logout from FWB Mshiko
Do you want to exit from FWB Mshiko?
Member details is not available, kindly fill the registration form
Failure in sending data, please try again
Member has been approved | verified successful
There was a processing error. Please try again.
Loan is approved yet by referee
Loan is not approved yet by referee
Long term loan amount ranges from Tsh 200,000 to 2,500,000
Your loan request has been submitted successfully.
You have a pending loan request, please wait.
Your loan details have been stored
Your emergency loan request has been submitted
Your about to submit your emergency loan request. Tap Yes to proceed | No to cancel the request.
Write long term loan amount (include interest)
No user found with that phone number, retry
Password reset successful, details have been sent to your phone number
